name: Kfit Holdings
description: Provider of a fitness and leisure platform designed to offer a range of consumer goods and services. The company's platform connects consumers to spa, health and fitness, food and other deal providers to make fitness and other services more accessible to its users so that they can obtain an all-access membership, enabling them to build their own fitness and spa schedule by choosing from many classes and activities in their cities.
one_liner: Provider of a fitness and leisure platform designed to offer a range of consumer goods and services. The company's platform connects consumers to spa, health and fitness, food and other deal providers to make fitness and other services more accessible to its users so that they can obtain an all-access membership, enabling them to build their own fitness and spa schedule by choosing from many classes and activities in their cities.
